Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 40th overall pick, by New York (A) in 1981...
Released by New York (A) on 3/2/1981...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago (N) on 3/2/1981 to a minor league deal...
Injured on 8/22/1985 with a Pulled Bicep Tendon, out for 4 weeks...
Traded from Chicago (N) to Chicago (A) on 7/31/1986 (Going to CHC: RF M. Young. Going to CHW: P R. Dibble, P A. Ashby, P T. Ferreira, SS W. Weiss, C N. Santovenia)...
Earned first career win on 5/10/1989...
Was selected to the 1992 Allstar game...
